column4: can't upload via ftp, can't access email, can't load certain webpages...  wtf is wrong with my comp?
are you behind a router or firewall?
not sure about firewall, i'm on DSL
on DSL with or without a router?
no firewall on computer (unless ubuntu has one)
many DSL-routers have builtin firewalls
check if you are behind one and if yes, check it's settings
i believe it is a router
what settings am i checking?
the settings of your router
but settings for what? to see if there is a firewall?
yes. check if your router has a builtin firewall and check it's settings
ok, my router's firewall was set to allow all traffic, no issue there.
ok. so what exactly does not work?
i can't enter yahoo groups members area (and various other log-in sites), i can't upload anything via FTP.  I've tried multiple browsers/clients, everything stalls and/or fails.
i can't enter yahoo groups members area (and various other log-in sites), i can't upload anything via FTP.  I've tried multiple browsers/clients, everything stalls and/or fails.
can you reach the adresses of the sites in any other way? do the servers answer to a ping?
i don't know how i would reach the sites without a browser, yes they answer to a ping
do those sites use some plugins like for example flash, and you don't have it installed?
no the only thing they require is cookies, which is enabled
sorry... don't know how to help
